name: FoodInsecurity
title: Food Insecurity
description: Determination of whether and degree to which the person experiences limited or uncertain availability of nutritionally adequate and safe foods or limited or uncertain ability to acquire acceptable foods in socially acceptable ways. (Business ID: Entry 743862)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Food Insecurity.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of whether and degree to which the person experiences limited or uncertain availability of nutritionally adequate and safe foods or limited or uncertain ability to acquire acceptable foods in socially acceptable ways..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Food Insecurity.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Food Insecurity.)

contains.display: Other specified lack of adequate food
